translation.en: ♪ Hey ♪
[Alan] You know, this Lamaze class got me concerned.
translation.fr:
Ce cours d'accouchement sans douleur
m'a inquiété.

translation.en: Is there really a chance that you're gonna stop breathin' while givin' birth?
translation.fr:
Tu pourrais arrêter de respirer
en accouchant ?

translation.en: -What? -Like everything is going great,
translation.fr:
Imagine, tout va bien,
je suis en train de compter,

translation.en: and I'm like, "One, two, three," and your face turns blue,
translation.fr:
Imagine, tout va bien,
je suis en train de compter, et tu deviens bleue,

translation.en: and you stop breathing, I'm like, "Breathe! Breathe!" [laughs]
translation.fr:
t'arrêtes de respirer,
et je suis là : "Respire ! "

translation.en: Alan, it's about us being ready.
translation.fr: Alan, on doit juste être prêts.

translation.en: It's about us doing this together.
Well, you know, girl, doing this together is what got us here in the first place.
translation.fr:
Ouais, faire ça ensemble,
c'est ce qui nous a amenés ici.

translation.en: Except your breathing was more like, "Oh, Alan!  -Oh, it's amazing!" -Alan.
translation.fr:
Sauf que ta respiration, c'était plus :
"Alan ! C'est incroyable ! "

translation.en: -"Oh, Alan, it's so big!" -Alan!
-"It's so big!" -Stop it! You're being ridiculous!
Oh, I gotta get back to work. It's the last day before maternity leave.
translation.fr:
Je dois retourner travailler. C'est
le dernier jour avant mon congé mat.

translation.en: -I'm gonna miss work. -Yeah, I wish I could say the same.
translation.fr:
Le boulot va me manquer. J'aimerais pouvoir en dire autant.
Linda est furax.

translation.en: -Linda's on a warpath. -Oh.
translation.fr:
J'aimerais pouvoir en dire autant.
Linda est furax.

translation.en: Apparently, Doug pitched a new holiday e-card, and it didn't go so well.
translation.fr:
Doug a présenté la nouvelle
carte virtuelle et ça s'est mal passé.

translation.en: Babe, who's gonna send an e-card for someone graduating from rehab for the second time?
translation.fr:
Qui envoie une carte à quelqu'un qui sort
de désintox pour la deuxième fois ?

translation.en: Well, it was a lot better than "Happy Hoe-loween". You know, for women that wear slutty costumes.
translation.fr:
C'était mieux que : "Joyeux Hallo-pine".
Pour celles qui portent des costumes sexy.

translation.en: Or what about "White Kwanzaa," which makes absolutely no sense at all.
translation.fr: Ou : "Kwanzaa blanc" qui n'a aucun sens.

translation.en: And don't forget to tell Linda you're taking paternity leave.
translation.fr:
N'oublie pas de parler à Linda
du congé paternité.

translation.en: I know. Listen, nothing's more important to me than my family,
translation.fr:
Oui. Rien n'est plus important
que ma famille,

translation.en: not even a partnership
at the company I've been busting my ass for all these years.
translation.fr:
pour lequel je me casse le cul
depuis des années.

translation.en: You think maybe I should've just slept my way to the top?
translation.fr: Tu crois que j'aurais dû coucher ?

translation.en: Okay, babe. I'll see you later.
Don't think Linda want it? You see the way Linda looks at your boy!
translation.fr:
Linda refuserait ? - T'as vu comme elle me regarde ?
- Je m'en fous.

translation.en: -Not interested in that conversation. -Don't be jealous.
translation.fr:
- T'as vu comme elle me regarde ?
- Je m'en fous. Ne sois pas jalouse.

translation.en: -I love you. -[Marie] Love you, too.
Bye.
Linda, I wanna apologize for the pitch.
translation.fr: Linda, je m'excuse pour la présentation.

translation.en: You know, I've been delegating more to the team, and I want...
translation.fr:
J'ai pas mal délégué à l'équipe
et je veux...

translation.en: Y-You know, 'cause the baby's due soon--
I know you got a lot on your plate, Alan.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu es surchargé, Alan.

translation.en: I won't pretend to understand, I never wanted babies. Ick!
translation.fr:
Mais je vais pas faire semblant,
j'ai jamais voulu de bébés.

translation.en: [stammers] You know, um...
I-I-I don't usually drink at work.
translation.fr: je ne bois pas d'habitude au travail.

translation.en: -[slurps] -Oh, damn.
Alan. There was a time when you took charge.
translation.fr:
Alan.
Avant, tu prenais les choses en main.

translation.en: You were aggressive. You dressed the part.
translation.fr: Tu étais agressif, tiré à quatre épingles.

translation.en: You were becoming the face of this company, literally!
translation.fr:
Tu allais devenir le visage
de cette boîte, littéralement !

translation.en: Now... everything's about...
translation.fr: Maintenant, tout tourne autour du bébé.

translation.en: Linda, that's what I wanted to talk to you about.
translation.fr: Linda, c'est ce dont je voulais te parler.

translation.en: [stammers] I'm gonna be taking some time off.
-What? -Just a month or so.
It's like paternity leave. [Linda] Paternity leave?!
translation.fr:
- Un congé paternité.
- Un congé paternité ?

translation.en: You're in line for a partnership.
Do you really think, Alan, this is the right time to vacay?
translation.fr:
Tu penses que c'est le moment
de prendre des vacances ?

translation.en: It's not a vacay. I just want to be there for my family.
translation.fr:
C'est pas des vacances.
Je veux être là pour ma famille.

translation.en: And you know what? That partnership, I earned it.
Now, I have a baby appointment, and I promised Marie I'd be there.
translation.fr:
J'ai rendez-vous chez le gynéco
et j'ai promis à Marie que je serais là.

translation.en: [Linda] Fine!
[mocking] Go to your little appointment with your sonogram and your gel.
translation.fr: Va faire ton échographie et mets du gel.

translation.en: [Dr. Greenberg] Everything looks great.
Right where you'd expect to be at 35 weeks.
translation.fr:
Exactement comme ça doit être
à 35 semaines.

translation.en: -[Marie chuckles] -Thank you. Lights, please.
Now, because of your advanced maternal age--
Uh, I'm only 35.
-And 35 is really 15 in Black-people age. -Mm-hmm.
translation.fr: Et 35 ans, c'est 15 ans en âge noir.

translation.en: You know that black don't crack...
[both] ...unless you smoke it. Okay?
Sure, but 35 is still considered an elevated risk pregnancy.
translation.fr:
Bien sûr. Mais à 35 ans on considère
la grossesse à risques.

translation.en: -Uh, no pre-eclampsia in your family? -No.
translation.fr:
- Des prééclampsies dans la famille ?
- Non.

translation.en: -No food allergies? No history of cancer? -No.
No, she has A-plus genes. You know, her daddy's a federal judge.
translation.fr:
Non, elle a des gènes au top.
Son père est un juge fédéral.

translation.en: She graduated top of her class at Columbia Law,
translation.fr: Elle a fini première en droit à Columbia,

translation.en: and she's the first female partner in her firm.
translation.fr:
et c'est la première associée
de son cabinet.

translation.en: Hey, Doc... I trapped her.
-Uh, one more thing... -[Marie] Hmm?
Alan... we don't have your family history.
translation.fr:
Alan. Nous n'avons pas
vos antécédents familiaux.

translation.en: Oh, well, there's a perfectly good explanation for that. I don't have one.
translation.fr:
Et il y a une bonne explication.
Je n'ai pas de famille.

translation.en: See, I was put up for adoption, and I was raised in foster homes.
translation.fr:
Je suis orphelin,
j'ai été élevé en familles d'accueil.

translation.en: I moved around a lot. I never really met my birth mother.
translation.fr:
J'ai beaucoup bougé.
Je ne connais pas ma mère.

translation.en: Hence, no family medical history.
[Marie] But...
he checked out great after his last physical.
translation.fr: son dernier examen de santé était parfait.

translation.en: That's right. You are lookin' at one perfect human specimen.
translation.fr:
C'est vrai. Vous avez devant vous
un spécimen humain parfait.

translation.en: Now, what more could you ask for?
Girl!
-Look at that! -[Marie laughs]
-Little baby gonna come out buff. [grunts] -[growls]
translation.fr: Ce bébé va sortir super baraqué.

translation.en: [Alan] Why can't they just put it in the chart,
translation.fr: Pourquoi c'est pas dans le dossier ?

translation.en: "Don't know family medical history"?
She has to ask. She's not judging you, baby.
translation.fr: Elle doit demander. Elle ne te juge pas.

translation.en: So what if I don't know if my family has high blood pressure or diabetes,
translation.fr:
Et si je ne sais pas si ma famille
a de l'hypertension ou du diabète,

translation.en: or the gene that gives you the little webby thing between your toes that makes it impossible to wear flip-flops?
translation.fr:
ou ce truc des orteils palmés
qui t'empêche de porter des tongs ?

translation.en: Listen, black people don't even wear flip-flops.
translation.fr: Les Noirs ne portent même pas de tongs.

translation.en: You're right, baby, we don't.
Makes our heel hard and our baby toe ashy.
translation.fr:
Ça nous durcit le talon
et nous blanchit le petit orteil.

translation.en: You know, and I've tried every DNA website there is.
translation.fr: J'ai testé tous les sites d'ADN.

translation.en: I mean, all I found out was I may be related to Cleopatra...
translation.fr:
Tout ce que j'ai trouvé, c'est
que j'ai peut-être un lien avec Cléopâtre,

translation.en: and I'm 1/23 Irish.
translation.fr: et que je suis un 23e irlandais.

translation.en: Alan, my father is a federal circuit judge. I've told you this a million times.
translation.fr:
Alan, mon père est juge fédéral.
Je te l'ai dit un million de fois.

translation.en: He'd be happy to help you find your family. No. No, Marie.
translation.fr:
- Il peut t'aider à retrouver ta famille.
- Non, Marie.

translation.en: That man don't like me.
He stopped liking you after you started liking me.
translation.fr:
Et il t'aime plus
depuis que tu m'aimes.

translation.en: I don't wanna owe that man anything.
translation.fr: Je ne veux rien lui devoir.

translation.en: Look, Alan.
If this is as important to you as you say it is, now is the perfect time to ask.
translation.fr:
Si c'est si important pour toi,
c'est le moment de demander.

translation.en: [Alan] Who has a Sunday brunch on a Saturday?
translation.fr: Qui fait un brunch dominical un samedi ?

translation.en: Not even white folks do that.
[Marie] My mom insisted.
[Alan] Aw, I love your mommy.
Only thing I don't like about your mommy is your daddy.
translation.fr:
Le seul truc que j'aime pas chez elle,
c'est ton père.

translation.en: Surprise!
Mommy!
-Oh, my little Pooh Bear! -Oh! Never surprise a pregnant lady.
translation.fr:
- Mon petit Ourson !
- On ne surprend pas une femme enceinte.

translation.en: Don't y'all know that?
-Yeah, my water almost broke. -[Janet] Marie.
translation.fr:
- J'ai failli perdre les eaux.
- Marie.

translation.en: The whole family is here for you.
translation.fr: Toute la famille est là pour toi.

translation.en: Really?
Your sisters, every aunt, uncle, cousin!
translation.fr:
Tes sœurs, tes tantes,
tes oncles, tes cousins.

translation.en: -Cousins, cousins, cousins. -Oh, Mom.
-This is like a Tyler Perry movie in here. -Oh, stop it.
translation.fr:
On se croirait
dans un film de Tyler Perry.

translation.en: [Alan] So, Doug, your date, she seems really, um...
translation.fr: Alors, Doug. Ta copine a l'air vraiment...

translation.en: -outgoing. -Oh, yeah.
-She's a Russian aerial dancer. -[Alan] Okay.
-You know, like with ribbons? -Yeah, yeah.
translation.fr:
- De tissu aérien, tu vois ?
- Oui.

translation.en: That, or she's a spy.
Or maybe she's just a thief. I'm not sure.
translation.fr:
Ou peut-être juste voleuse.
Je suis pas sûr.

translation.en: But I'm keeping my sensitive documents in a safe just in case.
translation.fr:
Mais je garde mes documents sensibles
sous clé, au cas où.

translation.en: Smart man.
-Doug. -Marie.
Oh, thank you so much for coming!
Oh, such a great shower!
-And these mommy-mosas are on fleek. -[Marie] Right?
-We don't say that. -Mm-mm.
Uh, off the chain.
-That's old. -No.
-They're the bomb. -[Alan and Marie] Stop.
Uh, shit, she's stealing.
-[Marie] What? -Excuse me.
So...
Dad's at the grill,
so now's the perfect chance to talk to him.
-Hey. -Hmm?
-Dad, I was... -Ooh.
Sorry. Judge...
-Mm-hmm. -[Alan] Sir.
I got something I wanted to talk to you about.
You know, I wasn't exactly in favor of you marrying my daughter.
translation.fr:
Je n'étais pas vraiment d'accord
pour que tu épouses ma fille.

translation.en: You kind of mentioned that during the wedding,
translation.fr:
Oui. Vous l'avez plus ou moins dit
pendant le mariage,

translation.en: when the preacher said, "Speak now or forever hold your peace."
translation.fr:
quand le pasteur a dit :
"Parlez ou taisez-vous à jamais."

translation.en: You... you didn't hold your peace.
Alan, I'm trying to make sure that you understand that you're...
translation.fr: J'essaie de te faire comprendre que tu...

translation.en: you're about to become the father of my grandchild.
translation.fr: vas devenir le père de mon petit-fils.

translation.en: I know this. And that-- that-- Sir.
[stammering] I leased a brand new SUV.
translation.fr: J'ai pris un SUV tout neuf en leasing.

translation.en: It's red, so everybody knows it's coming.
translation.fr: Il est rouge, donc très voyant,

translation.en: Got the little "Baby On Board" sticker in the back,
and I'm almost finished with the nursery.
translation.fr: et j'ai presque fini la chambre du bébé.

translation.en: I got a few finishing touches to put on, but--
-[sizzling] -[Leland] Damn it.
That's not what I'm talking about.
translation.fr: Je ne parle pas de ça.

translation.en: Son...
I want to share something with you.
translation.fr: je vais te dire une chose.

translation.en: Family is everything.
You don't have a family.
Now, Marie brings generations of success to the table.
translation.fr: Marie amène des générations de succès avec elle.

translation.en: What exactly are you bringing?
I can throw with both arms.
-You can throw with both arms? -Mm-hmm.
Listen, sir.
I want to find my birth family.
translation.fr: Je veux retrouver ma famille biologique.

translation.en: But see, I need a court order
translation.fr: Mais j'ai besoin d'un ordre du tribunal

translation.en: to unseal my adoption records.
-Well, just so I'm clear... -Yes. -So I'm clear... -Mm-hmm.
translation.fr:
- Pour être clair et je vais l'être.
- Oui.

translation.en: You're asking me for a favor?
Not a favor. Like a... "Favor" is a big word.
translation.fr: Pas une faveur. C'est un grand mot.

translation.en: Like... adjust it. A "solid".
translation.fr: Disons plutôt un coup de main.

translation.en: No, no. I wanna hear "favor." "Solid" doesn't work here.
translation.fr:
Non. Je veux entendre une faveur,
pas un coup de main.

translation.en: Can we not say "favor" so hard?
translation.fr: On peut ne pas le dire trop fort ?

translation.en: "Judge, could you do me a favor?" Can you say something like that?
translation.fr:
"Vous me feriez une faveur, M. le Juge ?"
Répète.

translation.en: Can you do me a f--
Can you do me a favor?
There you go.
There you go. That wasn't that hard, was it?
-It was. -It was actually easier
than I thought it was going to be.
You...You know, you...
You're not much of a fighter, are you, son?
translation.fr: Tu ne luttes pas beaucoup, fiston, si ?

translation.en: -Hmm? -No.
[Marie chuckles] What is this?
Aw! How cute is this?
Alan, look.
You know, I've been trying to get that information for years,
translation.fr:
J'essaie d'obtenir ces informations
depuis des années,

translation.en: and your father got it in less than an hour.
translation.fr:
et ton père les a eues
en moins d'une heure.

translation.en: Open it.
Marie, now... Now, once I open this, y-y-you know there's no going back.
translation.fr:
Une fois que j'aurai ouvert ça,
je pourrai plus revenir en arrière.

translation.en: Open the damn thing!
Um, Marie...
my whole life I always wondered what my birth family was like.
translation.fr:
je me suis toujours demandé
comment était ma famille biologique.

translation.en: Where'd they come from? Were they poor? And... And they worked hard,
translation.fr:
D'où ils venaient ? S'ils étaient pauvres,
mais qu'en travaillant dur,

translation.en: and then they started a successful dry cleaning company,
translation.fr:
ils avaient créé une boîte
de nettoyage à sec,

translation.en: [stammers] and then they got rich,
and they moved across town to the East side,
translation.fr:
et avaient déménagé
dans les quartiers est,

translation.en: and then they bought a deluxe apartment--
Alan.
That's The Jeffersons. I know, but a boy could dream.
translation.fr:
- C'est dans The Jeffersons, ça.
- On peut rêver !

translation.en: -Just open the dag-gone thing! -Okay! Don't yell at me.
translation.fr:
- Ouvre ce truc !
- OK. Ne crie pas.

translation.en: [Marie] God! Just avoiding it.
Baby, this is just stuff. I can't... I can't make nothin' of this.
translation.fr:
C'est quoi ces trucs ?
Je peux rien faire de ça.

translation.en: Okay, okay, all right. Records of Transfer...
Oh, my gosh, Alan. It's your birth certificate.
translation.fr:
Oh, mon Dieu, Alan.
C'est ton acte de naissance.

translation.en: Look.
-[Alan] Oh, sh... Marie. -[Marie chuckles]
translation.fr:
ÉTAT DE GÉORGIE
ACTE DE NAISSANCE Marie...

translation.en: It's my birth certificate. [stammers] This is me!
translation.fr: Mon acte de naissance. C'est moi !

translation.en: Yep, all five pounds and six ounces of you.
translation.fr: Oui, toi et tes deux kilos cinq.

translation.en: -Hey! That's a healthy baby! -That's a good baby.
-Yeah. -Yeah.
-A little slim. -Little slim.
translation.fr:
- Un peu mince.
- Un peu mince.

translation.en: Oh. No father on record.
Oh! Alan, look.
Your birth mother's name is right here.
translation.fr: Le nom de ta mère biologique est ici.

translation.en: Lynette Spellman.
Lynette?
Wow! You know any Lynettes?
Uh, no.
I know a Lynette. My barber, the one that cuts my hair?
translation.fr:
J'en connais une. Ma coiffeuse,
celle qui me coupe les cheveux !

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -She's a Lynette!
She faded it a little high, but I think she was high when she faded it.
translation.fr:
Si. Le dégradé va un peu loin,
mais elle aussi, elle était loin.

translation.en: -She did good. -Maybe my mom owns a salon!
translation.fr:
C'est bien. Peut-être que ma mère a un salon,
qu'elle a inventé les rajouts.

translation.en: Maybe she invented the weave.
translation.fr:
Peut-être que ma mère a un salon,
qu'elle a inventé les rajouts.

translation.en: And you're wearin' a weave right now, and that's why I was attracted to you,
translation.fr:
Comme ceux que tu as,
c'est peut-être pour ça que tu m'as plu,

translation.en: 'cause you remind me of the weave that my mama created!
translation.fr:
parce que tu me rappelles les rajouts
de ma mère !

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my God, maybe my mother's a millionaire!
Well, maybe you could ask her yourself.
Her address is right here.
-My-- -Look at this.
-I got a mommy. -You got a mama, baby.
translation.fr:
- J'ai une maman.
- Tu as une maman.

translation.en: -I got a mama. -Baby.
-I got a mama. -Baby.
-Hey. -[Marie laughs]
-You got a grand-mommy! -You've got a grandma!
translation.fr:
- Tu as une grand-mère !
- Tu as une grand-mère !

translation.en: -But what if she doesn't wanna meet me? -How can she not wanna meet you?
translation.fr:
- Et si elle veut pas me rencontrer ?
- C'est impossible !

translation.en: Now, listen, you better hurry up, or you'll miss your chance.
translation.fr:
Écoute, dépêche-toi
ou tu vas laisser passer ta chance.

translation.en: 'Cause in a couple of weeks, you're gonna have to focus on the family you have right here.
translation.fr:
Parce que dans 15 jours,
tu devras être là pour ta famille ici.

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay?
Thank you.
Don't worry. I'll be back.
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas. Je reviens.

translation.en: -Okay. -[engine turns over]
Probably in a helicopter, because, you know, my mama is ballin'!
translation.fr:
Sûrement en hélicoptère,
parce que ma mère est blindée !

translation.en: Love you! A lot!
Bye, baby! And other baby!
translation.fr: Au revoir, bébé ! Et l'autre bébé !

translation.en: ♪ So, whatever ♪
What do I call her?
Hey...
Mom!
I... I forgive you, Mom.
Yeah, I'm not even a little bitter that you wasn't around
translation.fr:
Oui, je suis un peu amer
que tu n'aies pas été là

translation.en: for the last 38 years, you frickin' bitch!
I'm sorry.
It's gonna be cool. It's gonna be good. Mm-hmm.
translation.fr: Ça va être cool. Ça va bien se passer.

translation.en: [man] Just leave the mail on the porch!
translation.fr: Laissez le courrier sous le porche !

translation.en: Oh, hey!
[man] You're not our usual mailman.
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes pas le facteur habituel.

translation.en: No, I'm-- I'm not with the Postal Service.
translation.fr: Non, je ne suis pas de la poste.

translation.en: Sir, I am anxiously awaiting an episode of Mork & Mindy.
translation.fr:
Monsieur, j'attends impatiemment
un épisode de Mork and Mindy.

translation.en: So, you leave me no choice to be somewhat rude
translation.fr: Alors, vous m'obligez à être impoli

translation.en: and say, "Please, go away!"
translation.fr:
et vous dire :
"Partez, s'il vous plaît !"

translation.en: Who watches Mork & Mindy still?
translation.fr: Qui regarde encore Mork and Mindy ?

translation.en: [knocking] Sir!
Does Lynette Spellman live here?
No. And I'll say it in Spanish,
translation.fr: Non. Et je vais le dire en espagnol :

translation.en: "El no."
Then, why is "L. Spellman" on the mailbox?
translation.fr:
Alors, pourquoi il y a écrit :
"L. Spellman" sur la boîte ?

translation.en: Very well.
But she's not here.
Really? Damn it.
What do you want?
My name is Alan,
and Lynette Spellman is my mother.
translation.fr: et Lynette Spellman est ma mère.

translation.en: Lynette Spellman only has one son, and his name is Russell.
translation.fr:
Lynette Spellman n'a qu'un fils,
et il s'appelle Russell.

translation.en: Right. I have proof.
What in the quantum leap?
Give me that.
This can't be. I'm her son!
translation.fr: C'est impossible. C'est moi, son fils.

translation.en: This... This is a mistake!
Wait, you're her son?
I'm her son. That means we're brothers!
translation.fr: Moi aussi. Donc, on est frères.

translation.en: Wait. You're my brother, Russell!
translation.fr: Attendez. Vous êtes mon frère, Russell !

translation.en: No, no, no, no. No, no. Look, right there. You see that? See that?
See that misprint? See that date there, that's my birthday.
translation.fr:
La faute d'impression ?
Cette date, c'est mon anniversaire.

translation.en: -And, see-- -Yeah, but that's my birthday.
Yeah, but that would only make sense if, in fact,  you and I were... [chuckles]
translation.fr:
Oui, mais ça ne serait possible
que si vous et moi, on était...

translation.en: Twins.
We're twins.
Russell!
We're twins!
Come here, bro!
This is awkward.
I've never had a man hug me before.
translation.fr: J'ai jamais fait de câlin à un homme.

translation.en: If you don't release me, I'm gonna be forced to use my warning whistle
translation.fr:
Si tu me lâches pas,
je vais devoir utiliser le sifflet que maman m'a donné.

translation.en: Mother gave me.
translation.fr: le sifflet que maman m'a donné.

translation.en: Okay, I warned you.
-[whistles] -All right, shh, shh! Hey!
-Stranger danger! Stranger danger! -[dogs barking]
Can we... Can we go inside?
Don't touch anything with your measly hands.
translation.fr: Ne touche à rien avec tes mini-mains.

translation.en: Everything here is very valuable.
These are antiques, especially the TV Guide,
translation.fr:
Ce sont des antiquités,
surtout le programme télé,

translation.en: so it's gonna be worth billions one day.
translation.fr: il vaudra des milliards un jour.

translation.en: Well, here's some more news.
-You're about to be an uncle. -Phooey.
-Uncle Russell. -That's a terrible name.
-Has a little ring to it. -Sounds like a cheesy morning disc jockey.
translation.fr: C'est pas mal. On dirait un nom de DJ ringard matinal.

translation.en: This is the family home, huh?
Yeah. Jealous? [chuckles]
I still can't believe that I'm standing here with my very own twin.
translation.fr:
J'arrive toujours pas à croire
que je suis en face de mon jumeau.

translation.en: [Russell] Me neither.
I mean, look at us.
We look exactly alike.
Yeah, we... We look almost...
exactly... nothing alike.
No, we look exactly, exactly alike.
It's like I'm looking at myself in the mirror.
translation.fr:
C'est comme si je me regardais
dans le miroir.

translation.en: It's uncanny!
Same face, same hairline.
Well, I'm a lot more handsome. That's why I got the beauty marks and you don't. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
Mais je suis bien plus beau. C'est pour ça
que j'ai des grains de beauté, et pas toi.

translation.en: So, Russell, I... take it you still live here.
translation.fr:
Donc, Russell...
Tu vis encore ici, c'est ça ?

translation.en: [scoffs] That's a rather obvious observation.
Why else would I have my very own cereal bowl  with my name written on it?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi j'aurais un bol de céréales
avec mon nom dessus, sinon ?

translation.en: -See? -Yeah.
It's so good. I love cereal. [slurps]
translation.fr:
C'est trop bon. J'adore les céréales.
Ça me...

translation.en: Well, that's something me and you have in common.
I like cereal, too. I'm more of a Wheat Chex guy myself.
translation.fr:
J'aime les céréales aussi.
Mais je préfère les Chex au blé.

translation.en: Wheat Chex?
I'm sorry, Alan. I like my cereals to be edible.
translation.fr:
Désolé, Alan.
J'aime les céréales comestibles.

translation.en: Preferably with the fruit-forward complexities of the Captain's Crunchberries.
translation.fr:
De préférence avec la complexité du fruit
des Captain's Crunchberries.

translation.en: So, when do I see her?
-Who? -[Alan] Mom.
I-I mean, Lynette.
When does she get back?
Uh... that's... that's rather hard to say.
Oh, I got so much stuff to ask her.
translation.fr: J'ai tellement de choses à lui demander.

translation.en: I mean, so many things I wanna tell her, like I'm married,
translation.fr:
J'ai plein de trucs à lui dire,
je suis marié,

translation.en: she's gonna be a grandma.
Uh, she's dead!
You said what?
Yeah, you know...
I regret to inform you...
Lynette Spellman has passed on.
How?
Car accident.
I told her she should check her brakes.
translation.fr: Je lui avais dit de vérifier ses freins.

translation.en: So she got up under that 1986 Honda Civic SE.
translation.fr:
Alors, elle est allée regarder
sous cette Honda Civic SE de 1986.

translation.en: It was blue. Periwinkle, to be exact.
translation.fr:
Elle était bleue.
Bleue pervenche, pour être exact.

translation.en: She was just that type of gal,
real hands-on and cheap as the day is long.
translation.fr:
bricoleuse,
avec des oursins dans les poches.

translation.en: Obviously, I couldn't do it for her.
translation.fr:
Je ne pouvais pas
le faire pour elle, bien sûr.

translation.en: Because of your size?
Because I know nothing about fancy, expensive, foreign cars like Hondas.
translation.fr:
Parce que j'y connais rien
en super voitures étrangères comme les Honda.

translation.en: So-- So, she was crushed?
I'm afraid so.
Oh, this is just so devastating. Just--
Uh, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Come on.
-Oh, I'm-- I'm sorry. -That's my seat.
Sorry, Alan. I've spent a lot of time  making this leather conform to only my buttocks.
translation.fr:
Désolé. Je passe beaucoup de temps
à faire ce cuir à mes fesses.

translation.en: Can't believe I finally find her and now it's too late.
translation.fr: Je la trouve enfin, et il est trop tard.

translation.en: Maybe you should just go home and mourn.
translation.fr: Tu devrais rentrer chez toi et la pleurer.

translation.en: Now, excuse me. My television show is on. Thank you.
translation.fr: Pardon. C'est l'heure de ma série. Merci.

translation.en: Do you have any pictures?
I hate havin' a brother already!
translation.fr: Je déteste déjà avoir un frère !

translation.en: Don't touch my cereal.
I lived my entire life with that woman, and although buck-toothed,
translation.fr:
J'ai vécu toute ma vie avec cette femme,
et même si elle avait des dents de lapin,

translation.en: she was a saint.
And what about Dad?
Deserted her the instant she got pregnant.
translation.fr:
Il a déserté
quand elle est tombée enceinte.

translation.en: But she carried on.
Seems like an amazing woman.
Indeed.
Sour ball?
Sure.
She never said anything about why she gave me up?
translation.fr:
Elle n'a jamais dit
pourquoi elle m'avait abandonné ?

translation.en: Never mentioned you. Not a word. [chews]
translation.fr: Elle n'a jamais parlé de toi. Pas un mot.

translation.en: Not a peep. [chuckles]
Oh, so sour.
[chomps] Ow! Ow!
[Russell] Seriously?
Did you just bite into a sour ball?
No wonder why Mother chose me.
translation.fr: Pas étonnant que maman m'ait choisi.

translation.en: Okay, fine. Can you just please get me a paper towel
translation.fr:
C'est bon. Tu peux m'apporter
une serviette en papier

translation.en: for my busted tooth?
You know, Mom loves sour balls.
She said Dad had sour balls and that was her attraction to him.
translation.fr:
Elle disait que papa avait des boules
acidulées, c'est ce qui lui plaisait.

translation.en: Hey, Alan!
Whatever you do,  don't go snoopin' through Mom's drawers.
translation.fr:
Ne va pas fouiner
dans les tiroirs de maman.

translation.en: She's got all kind of weird massagers and stuff in there.
translation.fr:
Elle a des trucs
de massage bizarres dedans.

translation.en: Family medical records!
What the hell is this?
Again, not to push you, but to nudge you really hard,
translation.fr:
Encore une fois, sans vouloir te pousser,
mais pour t'encourager à partir,

translation.en: Mork is about to talk to Orson and--
translation.fr: Mork va parler à Orson et...

translation.en: What's that?
Did you know about this?
She had six babies at the same time!
translation.fr: Elle a accouché de six bébés !

translation.en: -There was more of you? -Russell, there's more of us!
translation.fr:
- Il n'y a pas que toi ?
- Russell. Il n'y a pas que nous !

translation.en: Wait. So, if triplets is three, then...
translation.fr: Si les triplés sont trois, alors...

translation.en: Russell...
we're sextuplets!
Holy fudge!
[Marie] Aw, baby, I'm really sorry about your birth mom.
translation.fr:
MOTEL BRANDFORD
CHAMBRES LIBRES Je suis vraiment désolée
pour ta mère, bébé.

translation.en: It's okay, baby.
At least I still got Dawn, Ethan, Jaspar, Russell, and Baby Pete.
translation.fr:
J'ai encore Dawn, Ethan,
Jaspar, Russell et Bébé Pete.

translation.en: And, yes, Baby Pete is his legal name. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Oui, Bébé Pete est son nom légal.

translation.en: That's more ghetto than your Uncle Lil Stank-Stank.
translation.fr:
Ça fait encore plus ghetto
que ton oncle Lil Stank-Stank.

translation.en: Yeah, so far, I found a place of business on Ethan,
translation.fr:
Pour l'instant, j'ai trouvé un commerce
en lien avec Ethan,

translation.en: and nothing on Jaspar. That man's a ghost.
translation.fr:
mais rien sur Jaspar,
c'est un vrai fantôme.

translation.en: What about Dawn?
I got a number. I called it.
-So, what happened? -[Alan] Some dude picked up.
translation.fr: Et alors ? Un mec a décroché.

translation.en: Gave me a weird address in Alabama. Said I should bring cigarettes.
translation.fr:
Il m'a filé une adresse en Alabama
et m'a dit d'apporter des clopes.

translation.en: Well, be careful. You don't know these people.
translation.fr: Attention. Tu ne connais pas ces gens.

translation.en: Maybe one of them changed their name to Idris Elba.
translation.fr:
Peut-être que l'un d'eux
a changé son nom pour Idris Elba.

translation.en: You know, we do have strikingly similar bone structure.
translation.fr: On a des traits vraiment très similaires.

translation.en: But Idris has all of his teeth.
translation.fr: Mais Idris a toutes ses dents.

translation.en: Maybe I'll get a gold cap.
translation.fr: Je vais mettre une dent en or.

translation.en: No, no, no, no. Alan. Please! You can't meet your family like that.
translation.fr:
Non. Alan ! Tu ne vas pas
rencontrer ta famille comme ça.

translation.en: Girl, that's why I got this.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que j'ai ça, chérie.

translation.en: Boom. Super glue.
-[Marie] Oh, my God, Alan. -[clattering] Don't use that. Go see a dentist.
translation.fr:
Oh, mon Dieu. Ne fais pas ça.
Va voir un dentiste !

translation.en: -Baby... I'm gonna call you back. -Alan--
-[panting] -Russell! Oh. Hey, Alan.
How'd you get in my room?
I just told the hotel manager we were brothers. [chuckles]
translation.fr: J'ai dit à l'hôtelier qu'on était frères.

translation.en: Of course he believed me, 'cause we're twinsies.
translation.fr: Et il m'a cru parce qu'on est jumeaux.

translation.en: What are you even doing here?
translation.fr: Et qu'est-ce que tu fais là ?

translation.en: Well, good news.
I decided to join you on this excursion to find our siblings. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
J'ai décidé de me joindre à toi
pour trouver nos frères et sœurs.

translation.en: Well, I wasn't really expectin' any company. Sorry.
[Russell] Alan, my mother just died.
translation.fr: Alan. Ma mère vient de mourir.

translation.en: This trip may be the only thing to help me recover
translation.fr:
Ce voyage pourrait être la seule chose
qui me remette

translation.en: from the greatest tragedy of my young life.
translation.fr: de la plus grande tragédie de ma jeunesse.

translation.en: [cries] Please? I brought cereal.
translation.fr: S'il te plaît. J'ai apporté des céréales.

translation.en: Fine. Let's do it.
Really?
Tomorrow, we head out on a road trip.
translation.fr: Demain, on commence notre road trip.

translation.en: Okay-dokay.
Give us some time to really, you know, bro down.
translation.fr: Ça nous laissera le temps de "franginer."

translation.en: “Bro down”?
Did you just try to turn a noun into a verb?
translation.fr: Tu as transformé un nom en verbe ?

translation.en: Yeah, I... I guess.
That's grammatically incorrect.
Goodnight, Alan. Wanna cuddle?
[screams] Hey, man, you're naked! The hell?
translation.fr: Mec, t'es à poil ! Ça va pas ?

translation.en: Of course. I sleep in the nude.
I'm very comfortable with my body.
translation.fr: Je suis très à l'aise avec mon corps.

translation.en: The buck is beautiful.
Besides, it really helps with night sweats. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Et ça aide pour les sueurs nocturnes.

translation.en: You don't want me to have night sweats.
translation.fr: Mieux vaut que j'en aie pas.

translation.en: I'll have this mattress floatin' around like an old raft after a hurricane.
translation.fr:
Ou je vais faire flotter ce matelas
comme un radeau après un ouragan.

translation.en: Usually there's a dog on top.  It's all wet and dirty.
translation.fr:
D'habitude, il y a un chien dessus.
Tout mouillé et sale.

translation.en: Boy, if you don't put some damn clothes on...
translation.fr: Si tu mets pas de fringues...

translation.en: Fine. Obviously, somebody's insecure about their manhood.
translation.fr: D'accord. On n'assume pas tous sa virilité.

translation.en: You're lucky I brought my PJs, Alan. [scoffs]
translation.fr:
T'as de la chance,
j'ai apporté mon pijama.

translation.en: Oh, wow!
Russell, did you know Alabama has nearly 600 miles of coastline?
translation.fr:
Russell, tu savais que l'Alabama avait
presque 1 000 km de littoral ?

translation.en: I bet you Dawn has a big house on the beach.
translation.fr:
Je parie que Dawn a une grande maison
à la plage.

translation.en: This may not be obvious, Alan, but...
translation.fr: Ça va peut-être t'étonner Alan, mais...

translation.en: this is my first sleepover.
No!
Seriously.
Come on. I guess we could share the bed, now that you got some drawers on.
translation.fr:
On peut partager le lit
maintenant que t'as mis un caleçon.

translation.en: Yeah, I got my Underoos. Come on!
translation.fr: Oui, j'ai mis mon caleçon. Allez !

translation.en: -Let's go, Alan! -Hey! Hey, what are you doing?
We never got to do this as kids. Come on!
translation.fr: On n'a jamais fait ça enfants. Allez !

translation.en: Fine, but just for a little while.
translation.fr: OK, mais juste un petit peu.

translation.en: Then we gotta go to bed.
Come on! I betcha I jump higher than you! I bet I can jump higher than you, Alan!
translation.fr:
Allez ! Je parie
que je saute plus haut que toi ! Alan !

translation.en: -Look at this. I'm runnin' in the air. Mm. -Hey!
translation.fr: Regarde. Je cours en l'air. Ouais !

translation.en: This is kind of fun!
-I told-- -Oh!
[chuckles] Thank God, Mom's dead. We surely would've got a spanking for that one.
translation.fr:
Dieu merci, maman est morte.
On se serait pris une fessée pour ça.

translation.en: -Now, I know your big behind-- -[grunts]
Pillow fight!
-Oh! Oh, you want a pillow fight? Okay! -[grunts]
translation.fr: C'est ce que tu veux ? D'accord !

translation.en: -[grunts] -All right! Yeah!
-Okay. -That was a low blow!  -You want a pillow fight? -[mocking laugh]
translation.fr:
C'était un coup bas, ça !
Tu veux une bataille ?

translation.en: [grunts] Okay, that was good.
Oh! You got some power on you, -huh, big boy? -[chuckles]
-Take that! -[grunts]
-You're a nice, big target. -Show me what you got!
translation.fr:
Quelle bonne cible.
Montre-moi ce que t'as !

translation.en: Now, that's how you pillow fight!
translation.fr: Ça, c'est de la bataille d'oreillers !

translation.en: Now, that wasn't really nice of you, Alan.
You know, maybe we shouldn't pillow fight. It's still dangerous. It's fightin'!
translation.fr:
On devrait arrêter.
C'est dangereux. C'est de la bagarre.

translation.en: You know what? Sleepovers are a lot of fun. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Tu sais quoi ? J'adore les soirées pyjamas.

translation.en: I can't wait to see what happens tomorrow night.
translation.fr: J'ai hâte d'être à demain soir.

translation.en: Yeah. Tomorrow.
-[Alan] So long, Branford. -[Russell] Arrivederci, Branford.
[sniffs] And they thought I'd never leave. Proved them wrong. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
Ils croyaient que je partirais jamais.
Ils avaient tort.

translation.en: -Who? -Oh, the naysayers.
-Oh. -My teachers, my doctor,
the butcher, the baker,
the sixth grade crossing guard,
the sheriff, the deputy,
Mom's OB-GYN.
-Oh, goddamn. -[Russell] That's pretty much everybody.
translation.fr:
- Oh, bon sang.
- Ouais. Presque tout le monde.

translation.en: So...
-[munching] -Tell me something about yourself.
For what possible purpose?
What are you, the IRS? [laughs]
How about this? What's your earliest memory of Mom?
translation.fr:
Ça, par exemple.
Quel est ton premier souvenir de maman ?

translation.en: She forced me to eat an avocado, the hussy.
translation.fr:
Elle m'a forcé à manger un avocat,
la garce.

translation.en: -Okay. -It was disgusting, as you might imagine.
-[laughs] -Tastes like soft-boiled Silly Putty.
translation.fr: Ça a le goût du Silly Putty bouilli.

translation.en: That's something we have in common. I hate avocados, too.
translation.fr:
Encore un point commun.
Je déteste les avocats aussi.

translation.en: Great.
You like TV shows? How about we sing our favorite TV show theme song?
translation.fr:
Tu aimes les séries télé ?
Si on chantait notre générique préféré ?

translation.en: Ooh, how about we don't?
♪ Now the world don't move To the beat of just one drum ♪
translation.fr:
Personne dans le monde
Ne marche du même pas

translation.en: ♪ What might be right for you ♪
translation.fr: Et même si la terre est ronde

translation.en: ♪ May not be right for some ♪
♪ A man is born ♪ ♪ He's a man of means ♪
♪ Then along comes two ♪
♪ They got nothing but jeans ♪
♪ They got ♪ ♪ Diff'rent Strokes ♪ ♪ It takes ♪
translation.fr:
C'est vrai
Faut de tout, tu sais

translation.en: ♪ Diff'rent Strokes ♪ ♪ It takes ♪
♪ Diff'rent Strokes to move the world ♪
translation.fr: Faut de tout pour faire un monde

translation.en: I was a big fan of Diff'rent Strokes.
Oh, I got one, I got one.
What? Come on, that's the M*A*S*H* theme song!
translation.fr: Allez ! C'est le générique de MASH.

translation.en: Makes me sleepy.
Al right. I just thought it'd be good to play some theme songs.
translation.fr:
OK. Je pensais que ce serait cool
de chanter des génériques.

translation.en: Yeah, I got some good commercial jingles--
translation.fr: J'ai de bons jingles pub sinon.

translation.en: Russell.
-Russell! Hey. -Hmm?
I need you to drive. I'm gettin' tired.
translation.fr: Il faut que tu conduises. Je fatigue.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think so.
-What? Why not? -[Russell] 'Cause...
I have no interest in assuming legal responsibility for someone else's vehicle.
translation.fr:
je n'assumerai aucune responsabilité
dans le véhicule de quelqu'un d'autre.

translation.en: Seriously?
Also, I don't know how to drive.
translation.fr: Et je ne sais pas conduire.

translation.en: [laughing] You don't know how to drive? Get outta here!
Truth be told, I've always wanted to learn,
translation.fr: À vrai dire, j'ai toujours voulu apprendre

translation.en: so I could one day speed stylish down the road,
translation.fr: pour pouvoir un jour, accélérer élégamment

translation.en: in a gold '76 Pontiac Firebird Esprit.
translation.fr:
dans une Pontiac Firebird Esprit dorée
de 76.

translation.en: The same vehicle owned by James Scott--
Rockford!
In The Rockford Files! Man, that was my show!
translation.fr:
Dans 200 dollars plus les frais !
Ma série !

translation.en: Oh, I love The Rockford Files!
-Yo, that car was sick. -[Russell] The best.
You know, I own a copy of the original operator's manual for the car.
translation.fr:
J'ai une copie originale
du manuel d'utilisation de la voiture.

translation.en: -[Alan] Really? -[chuckles]
I've read it a dozen times or something.
translation.fr: Je l'ai lu au moins 12 fois.

translation.en: All right.
Well, Russell...
I'mma pull over right here, 'cause, uh... I'm tired.
translation.fr:
Je vais m'arrêter ici,
parce que je suis fatigué.

translation.en: Gonna get some Z's.
[Russell] Hmm, strange. I don't see no hotel around here, Alan.
translation.fr: Étrange. Je ne vois pas d'hôtel ici, Alan.

translation.en: [Alan] Because there isn't one, Russell.
translation.fr: Parce qu'il n'y en a pas, Russell.

translation.en: -[owl hoots] Tomorrow... I'm gonna give you your first driving lesson. How's that, huh?
translation.fr:
Demain, je te donnerai ta première leçon
de conduite. T'en penses quoi ?

translation.en: You positive this is safe?
Yeah, it's safe.
Listen, we're family. You got my back and I got yours, right?
translation.fr:
On est frangins.
Tu me défends et je te défends, OK ?

translation.en: I don't know, Alan.
[scoffs] You're not exactly the family I wanted.
translation.fr:
T'es pas exactement le frangin
que je voulais.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm all the family you got.
translation.fr: Mais je suis le seul que tu aies.

translation.en: You sound like the ending of a cheesy sitcom.
translation.fr: On dirait la fin d'un sitcom cucul.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Do you ever stop talking?
translation.fr: Bon sang. Ça t'arrive de te taire ?

translation.en: -Sometimes. -Go to bed.
-Um, if I had some warm milk or something. -Start countin' cereal boxes.
translation.fr:
Si j'avais du lait chaud... - Compte les boîtes de céréales.
- Bonne idée.

translation.en: That's a good idea.
translation.fr:
- Compte les boîtes de céréales.
- Bonne idée.

translation.en: -[Alan exhales] -One Lucky Charm.
-[owl hoots] -Mmm. Two Cap'n Crunch...
Three Froot Loops.
Hey, Russell, what time is it?
Russell?
Russell!
Russell!
What are you doing?
Why are you runnin' like Rerun from What's Happening?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tu cours comme Rerun
dans What's Happening!! ?

translation.en: -We should go now. -[Alan] Where are we goin'?
What are you runnin' from?
I think I'm ready for that driver's lesson now.
translation.fr: Je suis prêt pour la leçon de conduite.

translation.en: Oh, no!
My brand new Stan Smiths!
You should get in the car.
translation.fr: Tu devrais monter dans la voiture.

translation.en: You said what?
Sounds like...
What? This is some bull...
...shit.
How now, brown cow! Whoa!
Open the door! Open the door!
-Russell! Open the door! -[bellows]
Pop the handle! Pop the handle!
I am bewildered by this vehicle's technology.
translation.fr:
Cette superbe technologie
me laisse perplexe.

translation.en: [Alan] Open the door, Russell!
Toro!
-Stop it! -[honks horn]
Stop it!
You need to chill out.
Bro, if you don't pop the goddamn lock...
I don't see a key!
I got the key! I got the key!
Ah! I think your car is possessed!
-[bellows] -[screams]
What do we do now?
Press the brake!
Okay, brake. Pedal.
Okay, now what?
Put it in drive!
Put it in drive. Okay.
-Press the gas. Lightly. -Okay. Lightly.
What did you do to piss off a bull?
I was just trying to get some milk for my cereal and I pulled its teat!
translation.fr:
Je voulais du lait pour mes céréales,
j'ai tiré sa tétine !

translation.en: Watch, watch!
So, it was a good lesson. You wanna do it again?
I think this is a different big house than the one you imagined.
translation.fr:
C'est pas la grande maison
que tu imaginais.

translation.en: Are you certain this is the correct address?
translation.fr: On est sûrs que c'est la bonne adresse ?

translation.en: [woman over police radio] Three-thirteen, I copy.
[Dawn] You gonna stop stealin' on me like this.
Don't put your frickin' hands--
Don't put your hands on me, Deidra. Don't put your hands on me.
You gonna stop with this light-skinned privilege.
translation.fr: Ça suffit, les privilèges de Blanches.

translation.en: Just 'cause you got a badge and gun don't make you no better than me.
translation.fr:
T'es pas meilleure que moi
 parce que t'as un badge et un flingue.

translation.en: Ooh, that's your mama? You better put some money on my books. I'mma whoop your daughter's ass.
translation.fr:
C'est ta maman ? Garnis mon compte
ou je botte le cul de ta fille.

translation.en: -[woman] Dawn. -Call that black bitch!
You gon' get your ass kicked.
Dawn, let these people enjoy their family.
So, anyway...
This better be good, 'cause you cuttin' into my yard time.
translation.fr:
Ça vaut le coup ?
Parce que c'est mon temps de sortie.

translation.en: The guard over there say you my brother. Is that for real, for real?
translation.fr:
La gardienne là-bas dit
que t'es mon frère. C'est vrai ?

translation.en: Well, yeah. I mean... I got the birth certificate to prove it.
translation.fr: Eh bien, oui. J'ai un acte de naissance.

translation.en: I'm Alan.
[scoffs] No. I don't know you.

avec tous tes jolis tons de rose,

translation.en: with your honey-almond complexion.
Look at my lilttle redbone. Mm-mm.
translation.fr: Regardez mon petit café au lait.

translation.en: [yells] Now, put that goddamn gun down,
-'fore I spank the pink out yo ass! -I'm sorry, Mother. I'm so sorry.
translation.fr:
- ou je te flanque une fessée !
- Désolé.

translation.en: Who the hell you think you are?
I've been a bad boy.
Yes, you have.
I think I need a whooping.
You could just spank me all over my little red tushie.
translation.fr:
Tu pourrais me donner une tape
sur mes petites fesses rousses.

translation.en: -Oh, baby. -Oh, Mother. It's not your fault, honey.
translation.fr:
- Mon chéri. C'est pas ta faute.
- Maman.

translation.en: It's not your fault.
Oh, Mother. Your big man hands.
translation.fr: Oh, maman ! Tes grosses mains d'homme.

translation.en: Mama should've know something like this was gonna happen.
translation.fr:
Maman aurait dû se douter
que ça arriverait.

translation.en: [shuddering breaths] You all were just babies when I...
translation.fr: Vous étiez tous des bébés quand je...

translation.en: [crying] dropped you off like an old bag of dirty clothes.
translation.fr:
vous ai déposés
comme un vieux sac à linge sale.

translation.en: I was young.
A single mom with six babies. No husband.
translation.fr:
Une mère célibataire avec six bébés.
Pas de mari.

translation.en: [inhales deeply] No family.
I had no one.
It's such a stereotype.
It's okay.
[inhales deeply] 'Cause now all y'all have each other.
translation.fr:
Maintenant,
vous êtes là les uns pour les autres.

translation.en: Thanks to you, Alan.
So, why would you tell me she was dead?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu m'as dit qu'elle était morte ?

translation.en: All right, Alan, listen.  When you said you were my brother, I panicked.
translation.fr:
Écoute, Alan. Quand t'as dit
que t'étais mon frère, j'ai paniqué.

translation.en: I thought you was trying to take Mother from me.
translation.fr:
J'ai pensé
que tu voulais me prendre maman.

translation.en: Oh, baby.
So, why would you come along?
When I found out there was more of you... Well, "us"...
translation.fr:
Quand j'ai su qu'il y en avait
d'autres comme toi, comme nous,

translation.en: I had to see for myself.
And, well... since we hit the road together,
translation.fr: Et depuis qu'on a pris la route ensemble,

translation.en: I've done things I've only seen on television.
translation.fr:
j'ai fait des trucs
que j'ai vus qu'à la télé.

translation.en: Alan...
these past few days...
were the greatest of my life.
translation.fr: ont été les plus beaux de ma vie.

translation.en: [inhales deeply] And I know I'm not the family that you wanted...
translation.fr:
Je sais que je suis pas
la famille dont tu rêvais...

translation.en: But you're the family I got.
translation.fr: Mais tu es celle que j'ai.

translation.en: Wow.
This remind me of all those classic sitcom finales.
translation.fr:
Ça me rappelle les fins
de sitcoms classiques.

translation.en: [inhales deeply] Make you feel all warm and tingly inside.
Bros?
Bros.
[Lynette] Look at my baby. I'm so glad y'all made up, 'cause I was about to make y'all kiss on the mouth.
translation.fr:
Mon bébé. Ravie que vous soyez rabibochés,
j'allais vous embrasser sur la bouche.

translation.en: -That's how we do. -I want a kiss on the mouth.
translation.fr: C'est ce qu'on fait. Je veux bien, moi.

translation.en: Well, Mom, I guess if I'm gonna have a first kiss, -why not it be Alan? -No!
translation.fr:
Maman, pour mon premier baiser,
pourquoi pas Alan ?

translation.en: I always thought it was gonna be with Tootie from Facts of Life.
translation.fr:
Non ! Je voyais ça
avec Tootie de Drôle de vie.

translation.en: -[cell phone vibrates] -I never thought my first kiss
translation.fr:
Je pensais pas
que ce serait avec mon frère. Prêt ?

translation.en: -would be with my brother. Ready? -Excuse me.
translation.fr:
Je pensais pas
que ce serait avec mon frère. Prêt ? Excusez-moi.

translation.en: Marie. You're not gonna believe this,
translation.fr: Marie. Tu vas pas le croire,

translation.en: but I was on my way home, and I got kidnapped. Crazy, ri--
translation.fr:
j'allais rentrer
et j'ai été enlevé, c'est fou...

translation.en: -[Marie] My water broke. -Your what?
My water broke!
[stammers] You gotta get to the hospital.
I got you a long t-shirt that says, "Mom Hair, Don't Care."
translation.fr:
Je t'ai pris un long tee-shirt qui dit :
"Maman ourse."

translation.en: All I need is some weed 'cause I'm a little stressed.
translation.fr:
Il me faut juste un peu de weed
pour le stress.

translation.en: Alan, get back here! Do you hear me?
I'm havin' the baby!
[yells] Get back here!
-[line disconnects] -O-Okay.
It's Marie. She's in labor.
The baby's comin'!
Lord, God is good. I'm gonna be a grandma!
I'm gonna be an uncle! Uncle Russell. Terrible name.
translation.fr:
Et moi, un oncle. Oncle Russell !
C'est nul, ce nom.

translation.en: Hey, Alan.
Take my car.
Thanks... bro.
I'll stay with Mother. Maybe get that hug.
translation.fr:
Je reste avec maman.
J'aurai peut-être ce câlin.

translation.en: Oh, that's so sweet of you, baby.
If you scratch it, I'll kill ya.
translation.fr: Si tu la rayes, je te tue.

translation.en: [laughs] I was just joshin'.
No, I'm not.
Come on, Alan. Let's ride!
Come on, Russell. Come on!
-Bye, Mom! -Bye, Mom!
And make sure you change your underwear. You know you got that high-wipe!
translation.fr:
Et change de caleçon.
Tu sais que tu te fais dessus !

translation.en: Oh, shit!
A gold 1976 Pontiac Firebird Esprit!
translation.fr:
Une Pontiac Firebird Esprit dorée
de 1976 !

translation.en: The same one driven in...
[both] The Rockford Files!
-Come on, Russell. Let's go. -No, Alan.
I'll drive.
Hood slide!
I'm okay.
What are you doing?
I always wanted to do that.
You're on the wrong side.
Buckle up.
'Cause we're about to take off!
Sorry, Miss Gallagher!
Keep it between the lines, Russell!
Yeah, well, there's only so much you could learn from a manual, Alan.
translation.fr: On apprend pas tout dans un manuel, Alan.

translation.en: Go around. Go around 'em!
-[siren wails] -Uh-oh! Here comes the fuzz.
Russell, go! Go, go, go!
Don't worry, Alan. They'll never take us alive!
translation.fr:
T'inquiète, Alan.
Ils nous auront pas vivants.

translation.en: That's the idea! Let's go!
Well, they won't take you alive, but I'm gonna surrender. Sorry.
translation.fr:
Enfin, toi,
parce que moi, je me rendrai. Désolé.

translation.en: Hold on, Alan!
Watch out, coming through!
-[tires skid] -Watch the car!
-[Alan] Oh! -Move!
Alan, all these cars are going the wrong way!
translation.fr:
Toutes ces voitures vont
dans le mauvais sens !

translation.en: No, you're goin' the wrong way!
My bad!
This is like Dukes of Hazzard without the racist car.
translation.fr:
On dirait Shérif, fais-moi peur
sans la voiture raciste.

translation.en: -All right, Alan. Hospital's coming up! -Okay.
I'm gonna slow down a little, and I need you to tuck and roll.
translation.fr:
Je vais ralentir,
et tu vas faire une roulade.

translation.en: What? You want me to jump out of a moving car?
translation.fr:
Tu veux que je saute
d'une voiture en marche ?

translation.en: It worked for Jim Rockford every time!
translation.fr:
Ça marchait à chaque fois
 pour Jim Rockford !

translation.en: I ain't Rockford!
Now, do it! Go!
It worked. [groans]
Not today, fuzz.
That was a J-turn! I did a J-turn!
Go!
Eat my dust, copper!
[panting] I'm looking for my wife, Marie Daniels?
-Right in there. -Thank you.
[Ethan] Doc, you got the good angle.
translation.fr:
- Doc, vous avez le bon angle.
- Alan !

translation.en: Alan! Glad you could join us.
translation.fr:
- Doc, vous avez le bon angle.
- Alan ! - Ravie que vous soyez là.
- Alan !

translation.en: Alan!
translation.fr:
- Ravie que vous soyez là.
- Alan !

translation.en: -Baby's a little early, but it looks good. -Oh! Your brother's been a big help.
translation.fr:
Le bébé est un peu en avance,
mais ça va. Votre frère a beaucoup aidé.

translation.en: Ethan?
-What's up, bro? -You're doing great, Marie.
translation.fr:
- Ça va, frère ?
- Très bien, Marie.

translation.en: Keep breathing.
Wow! The resemblance is...
[both] uncanny.
Man, we look just alike!
I mean, if somebody just... [inhales sharply]  sucked all the cool out of me,
translation.fr:
Enfin, c'est comme si quelqu'un
avait aspiré tout le cool en moi,

translation.en: and I was a law-abiding citizen,
and I didn't kick puppies,
-or try to drown goldfish. -[Marie] Hey!
-I'm having a baby here. If you could... -Oh, hey. Hey, honey.
translation.fr:
- Je vais avoir un bébé. Tu peux...
- Oh, ma chérie.

translation.en: -Baby. -[PA beeps] Code Red.
-Code Red. -Hi, baby. Labor and Delivery is locked down under police order.
translation.fr:
La maternité est fermée
sur ordre de la police.

translation.en: Okay. Not to make it weird, but I'mma need you to speed things up.
translation.fr:
Ça va te sembler bizarre,
mais je vais te demander d'accélérer.

translation.en: I may be spendin' the first year of the baby's life in prison.
translation.fr:
Je vais peut-être devoir passer un an
en prison.

translation.en: -What? -No biggie. -No biggie. It's okay, baby. -[groans]
Damn. It's the po-po.
Fo sho-sho.
Why is the po-po after you?
Uh, speeding, reckless driving, possible vehicular assault.
translation.fr:
Excès de vitesse, conduite imprudente,
attaque en véhicule.

translation.en: We was in a high-speed chase.
Oh! [laughs] Respects, my G.
-What? -It's okay, we got away. Well, almost.
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- C'est bon, on s'en est sortis. Presque.

translation.en: You know what? Look here.
You gotta be here for Marie and that baby.
translation.fr: Tu dois être là pour Marie et ce bébé.

translation.en: I'mma need your pants.
My pants?
[woman] You are doing so good. You're doing great.
Hey, Ethan.
Thank you so much, man. I really appreciate this.
Hey, man. Ain't no thang but a chicken wang.
translation.fr: Y a pas de quoi fouetter un chat.

translation.en: We family, right?
Hey, about that partnership at work?
translation.fr: Et pour ton partenariat au boulot,

translation.en: You welcome.
[sucks teeth] You feel me?
Oh! Gross.
-[Marie] Hi, baby. -Hey, Ponch! John!
Come get your boy. Come on.
Okay. Oh, hey, hey. Hey, okay, okay.
-[deep breaths] -Okay, I'm here. Listen, listen.
I just want to say I'm so sorry.
Okay, I got so caught up meetin' my new family,
translation.fr:
J'étais si occupé
avec ma nouvelle famille,

translation.en: I forgot to appreciate the one I have right here at home.
translation.fr: que j'ai négligé celle que j'ai ici.

translation.en: I will never do it again, I promise.
translation.fr: Je ne le referai plus jamais. Promis.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure when the drugs wear off,
translation.fr: Une fois l'effet des médicaments passé,

translation.en: I'm gonna be so mad at you, and I'mma wanna bang you in the face.
translation.fr:
je vais être tellement énervée,
je vais te cogner,

translation.en: [crying] But I'm just so happy to have you here.
translation.fr: mais je suis si heureuse de t'avoir ici.

translation.en: Always. Always.
All right, Marie. I can see the head.
translation.fr: OK, Marie. Je vois la tête.

translation.en: Just give me one more push.
-Okay. Okay. -Ready? Come on, we'll breathe.
One, two, three.
[Russell] I watch a lot of Murder, She Wrote on this new iPad.
translation.fr:
Je regarde beaucoup Arabesque
sur ce nouvel iPad.

translation.en: -Hey, Douglas. -It's like having a TV in your pocket.
translation.fr:
- Salut, Douglas.
- C'est comme une télé.

translation.en: Babies, be careful!
Now, you know there's avocado in that nine-month layer dip.
translation.fr:
Il y a de l'avocat dans ce dip
à neuf couches.

translation.en: -I knew it. I knew it. -[spitting]
-[retches] -That is just nasty. What the hell?
Gross.
And why the hell is there nine layers in a dip?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi il y a neuf
couches dans un dip ?

translation.en: Everybody know dip only supposed to have seven layers.
translation.fr:
Tout le monde sait
qu'un dip n'a que sept couches.

translation.en: [Dawn] True.
-After that, you just repeating. -Worse than being waterboarded.
translation.fr:
- Vrai.
- Après ça, tu recommences. C'est pire que la torture.

translation.en: That's white people dip.
Now, Ethan, hush your mouth. You know these negroes are bougie.
translation.fr:
Ethan, tais-toi.
Ces Noirs sont des bourges.

translation.en: And Russell, you be careful. It makes you colic-y.
translation.fr:
Russell, attention.
Ça te file des coliques.

translation.en: -[Dawn] Eww. -Okay, Mom.
[Dawn] Why you wearing corduroy?
-You make my balls stink. -[Russell] Stop, Dawn.
translation.fr:
- Tu me fais suer.
- Dawn ! - Je prends la photo.
- Je veux jouer à Candy Land.

translation.en: -I want to play Candy Land. -Welcome to Wakanda!
translation.fr:
- Je prends la photo.
- Je veux jouer à Candy Land. Bienvenue au Wakanda !

translation.en: [stammers] Uh, baby, I think I should do somethin' about the dip.
translation.fr:
Chérie, je crois
que je devrais m'occuper du dip.

translation.en: Who doesn't like avocado?
Oh, that's a family trait.
[chuckles] That's right, baby.
I'll help you, Mom.
-Want to take her? -Yeah.
-She's all yours. -I got her.
[Ethan] Hey, where the Domino's at? What kind of black barbecue ain't got no damn Domino's?
translation.fr:
Où est le Domino's ? Quel barbecue
de Noirs n'a pas de Domino's ?

translation.en: Looks like I brought a little bit more to the table than you thought, huh?
translation.fr:
J'ai apporté un peu plus que prévu
finalement.

translation.en: Well, a couple of 'em look like they should be in jail.
translation.fr: Certains devraient être en prison, non ?

translation.en: -Hey, man! -Candy Land! Yes, let's do this!
Should be? A couple of them have been.
But you know what? That's my family.
translation.fr: Mais vous savez quoi ? C'est ma famille.

translation.en: And I'm gonna teach this little girl to love her family unconditionally.
translation.fr:
Et je vais apprendre à cette petite fille
à aimer sa famille sans réserve.

translation.en: Bro, I just want to thank you from the bottom of my heart for what you did for this family.
translation.fr:
Je veux te remercier du fond du cœur
pour ce que tu as fait pour cette famille.

translation.en: -You gonna be an amazing daddy. -Thank you.
translation.fr: Tu vas être un père génial.

translation.en: Even though our father wasn't shit.
translation.fr: Même si notre père valait rien.

translation.en: Aw, thanks, Dawn. That was almost emotional.
Now, as for you, Uncle Ben.
Let me tell you somethin'. I don't care what kind of judge you are,
translation.fr:
je vais vous dire un truc.
Vous pouvez être n'importe quel juge,

translation.en: Judge Judy, Judge Reinhold,
Ashley Judge, it don't make no difference to me.
Don't be throwin' shade at my brother, okay?
'Cause I don't mind goin' to jail.
translation.fr:
Parce que ça me dérange pas
d'aller en prison.

translation.en: -I like jail. -Uh, easy there, easy now.
For life, bro.
For life.
-For life, sis. -That's how we do.
translation.fr:
- Pour la vie, sœurette.
- C'est ça.

translation.en: -Look at me. I'm watchin' you. -[grunts]
I-I think she just threatened me, Alan.
translation.fr: Elle vient de me menacer, non ?

translation.en: Oh, that sounded more like a promise.
[chuckles] You want me to tell her back off?
translation.fr: Vous voulez que je la calme ?

translation.en: Well, if you would be so kind. I mean...
Are you askin' me for a favor?
-Uh... what? -You know, 'cause it sounded like a favor.
translation.fr: Quoi ? On dirait bien une faveur.

translation.en: Oh, no. Just... just a gesture, a kind gesture on your part.
Well, if you're askin' me for a favor, I'd like to hear it.
translation.fr:
Si c'est une faveur,
j'aimerais l'entendre.

translation.en: Dawn! As a favor to me, would you ask her to back off, Alan?
translation.fr:
- Dawn !
- Me ferais-tu la faveur de la calmer ?

translation.en: I got you.
Hey, Alan! Quick, come here!
Baby Pete wants to say "hi" to his niece. And you could say "hi" to your kidney.
translation.fr:
Bébé Pete veut dire bonjour à sa nièce.
Et tu pourrais dire bonjour à ton rein.

translation.en: Come on, bring that little nappyhead baby on over here!
translation.fr: Allez, ramène la petite afro ici !

translation.en: Oh, leave that baby alone.
-All right, I'm comin', I'm comin'! -Wait, wait, let me... Let me hold her.
-Give my regards to Peter. -Hi, Pee-pee!
Hey, Pee-pee.
Aw, man, she got my face.
Yeah, and your height.
Salud!
Are you drinking with my kidney?
Oh, get over it, Alan. You ain't gettin' it back!
translation.fr:
Passe à autre chose, Alan.
Tu le récupéreras pas.

translation.en: I'mma take it back.
Oh, you got to find me first!
I know exactly where he's at. His coordinates are right here.
translation.fr:
Je sais où il est.
Ses coordonnées sont là.

translation.en: I've a drone in the area. Want me to send in a strike?
translation.fr:
J'ai un drone dans le coin. Je tire ?
Je peux.

translation.en: -I will, I could do it. -Hey, Mama.
translation.fr:
J'ai un drone dans le coin. Je tire ?
Je peux. Salut, maman.

translation.en: Oh, my Lord.
Is that my Baby Pete?
Hey, Mama!
Got all my babies together at the same time?
translation.fr:
J'ai tous mes bébés réunis
en même temps ?

translation.en: Oh, Lord heard my prayer. [sniffles]
translation.fr: Le Seigneur a entendu ma prière.

translation.en: I went to church Sunday through Wednesday for this moment.
translation.fr:
Je suis allée à l'église
du dimanche au mercredi pour ça.

translation.en: [all] Mama! Mama!
Mama's good now. Mama's good. I'm just overwhelmed with emotion.
translation.fr:
Maman va bien.
Je suis juste submergée par l'émotion.

translation.en: If she dies, I get the jewelry.
translation.fr: Si elle meurt, je prends les bijoux.

translation.en: She's just feelin' the spirit of the Lord.
I'm gettin' emotional here. [sniffles]
Family photo time, y'all!
If it's not on the 'Gram, it's a scam!
translation.fr:
Si c'est pas sur Insta,
c'est n'importe quoi !

translation.en: Now, come on, babies. Come on.
Ow! Thank you.
What'd you hit me for?
It's not nice. I'm tellin' Mother.
translation.fr: C'est pas gentil. Je vais le dire à maman.

translation.en: Mother! Ethan hit me!
I hate having brothers and sisters.
translation.fr: Je déteste avoir des frères et sœurs.

translation.en: I want to be an only child again!
Bring it on in, fam. Bring it on in.
Russell, Russell, pay attention.
I want to see everybody in there. Miss Lynette, bring it in.
translation.fr:
Je veux voir tout le monde.
Venez, Mlle Lynette.

translation.en: This reminds me of the school picture episode of Eight Is Enough
translation.fr:
On dirait l'épisode de la photo de classe
de Huit, ça suffit ! où un...

translation.en: -where a young Nicholas Bradford-- -[all] Shut the hell up!
translation.fr:
On dirait l'épisode de la photo de classe
de Huit, ça suffit ! où un... La ferme, Russell !

translation.en: Hush!
You shut up.
Not you, Mom.
Okay, on three, two, one...
-Family! -[blows raspberry]
